# makeSelectionView()

**Instance Method**

Provides an opportunity to create a customized scrubber selection style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func makeSelectionView() -> NSScrubberSelectionView?
```

## Return Value

A correctly configured scrubber selection view that represents the appearance of your custom selection style.

## Discussion

In an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle] subclass that you create, override this method to create a custom selection style.

## Creating a selection style

- **init()**: Initializes a new scrubber selection style.
- **init(coder:)**: Initializes a scrubber selection style when included from a nib or Storyboard.
